name: The Infinite Mage
author: REDICE Studio
content: After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the &quotspirit zone,&quot the first step to learning how to use magic.
